messages.message:
So I am playing with reasoning fields and I have found a really frustrating inconsistency with our UI.
If I create a field -> change the field to reasoning before putting a field name -> write a field name -> write a prompt -> hit back
everything works great
on the other hand if I create a field -> write a field name ->  change the field to reasoning -> write a prompt -> hit back
the prompt is not saved and instead the prompt is the field name. Instead I have to hit RUN to save the prompt
cc: @Serena @lydia

> on the other hand if I create a field -> write a field name -> change the field to reasoning -> write a prompt -> hit back
> the prompt is not saved and instead the prompt is the field name
could this be because of the moderation check? @danny.lan

should we block the user from exiting the field editor if we're calling the moderation endpoint and haven't auto-saved the changes yet?
